maths.intro: Five milestones that shrank distances between people.

events.prompt: Johannes Gutenberg completes his movable-type printing press in Mainz.
Relation: First printed weekly newspaper appears in Strasbourg.
Samuel Morse sends the telegraph message 'What hath God wrought' between Washington and Baltimore.
Alexander Graham Bell makes the first successful telephone call.
Ray Tomlinson sends the first network email using the @ symbol.
